personal_statement_what_to_improve: Your personal statement should demonstrate a good use of standard English and accuracy in comprehension, spelling, punctuation and grammar.  You should include any attributes you have that will benefit the teaching profession and the schools you will be working in.  As a primary applicant, you should show an interest  in teaching across the curriculum.
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: The referees you choose should be from a professional background for example, a former university tutor, headteacher of a school you have worked/volunteered in or a significant person from the wider global community.
qualifications_other_reason_details: We were unable to check whether your qualifications were equivalent as you had not yet received your NARIC statement.
